mapper.select: SELECT A.EQ_CODE, A.EQ_NAME, A.EQ_TYPE, A.EQ_STS, B.EQ_CODE, B.OFF_NO, B.OFF_TYPE, B.OFF_INFO, B.OFF_STIME, B.OFF_ETIME, B.OFF_NOTE, B.EMP_CODE FROM EQ_EQUIP A JOIN EQ_OFF B ON(A.EQ_CODE = B.EQ_CODE) ORDER BY B.OFF_NO DESC
SELECT A.EQ_CODE, A.EQ_NAME, A.EQ_STS, B.* FROM EQ_EQUIP A LEFT JOIN EQ_OFF B ON(A.EQ_CODE = B.EQ_CODE)
SELECT A.EQ_CODE, A.EQ_NAME, A.EQ_STS, B.* FROM EQ_EQUIP A JOIN EQ_OFF B ON(A.EQ_CODE = B.EQ_CODE) WHERE B.EQ_CODE = #{eqCode}
